data.name: 图文双子链
data.template:
{
    "attribute": {
        "productId": "0",
        "name": "图文双子链"
    },
	"references":[
		{
			"referVarType":"main",
			"expressions": [
			        {
			            "key": "title",
			            "alias": "标题",
			            "validation": {
			                "minLen": 16,
			                "maxLen": 32,
			                "required": true,
			                "illegalChars": ""
			            },
			            "tips":"标题长度16到32个字符",
			            "inputType": "text",
			            "varType": "title",
						"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"},{\"key\":\"region\",\"value\":\"{#region#}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":true
			        },
					{
						"key": "desc_text",
						"alias": "描述",
						"validation": {
							"minLen": 16,
							"maxLen": 136,
							"required": true
							},
						"tips":"长度16到136个字符",
						"inputType": "text",
						"varType": "text",
						"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"},{\"key\":\"region\",\"value\":\"{#region#}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":true
					},
					{
						"key": "pic_img",
						"alias": "图片",
						"validation": {
							"suffixes": [
							"jpg",
							"jpeg",
							"png"
							],
							"maxSize": 100,
							"width": 150,
							"height": 120,
							"required": true
						},
						"tips":"请上150*120,大小不超过100kb图片,支持jpg,png",
						"inputType": "image",
						"varType": "image",
					"isShowKey":false
					},
					{
			            "key": "show_url",
			            "alias": "显示网址",
			            "validation": {
			                "minLen": 1,
			                "maxLen": 36,
			                "required": true,
			                "illegalChars": "",
							"type":"domainCheck"
			            },
			            "tips":"请填写显示网址，帐号注册域名或子域名",
			            "inputType": "text",
			            "varType": "url",
						"secondaryVarType":"show",
					"isShowKey":true
			        },
					{
			            "key": "target_url",
			            "alias": "目标网址",
			            "validation": {
			                "minLen": 1,
			                "maxLen": 1024,
			                "required": true,
			                "illegalChars": "",
							"type":"domainCheck"
			            },
			            "tips":"http(s)开头，帐号注册域名或子域名",
			            "inputType": "text",
			            "varType": "url",
						"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
			        },
					{
						"key": "1_subpath_text",
						"alias": "子链1",
						"validation": {
							"minLen": 1,
							"maxLen": 16,
							"required": true,
							"illegalChars": ""
						},
						"tips":"长度1到16个字符",
						"inputType": "text",
						"varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
					},
					{
						"key": "1_subpath_url",
						"alias": "目标网址1",
						"validation": {
							"minLen": 1,
							"maxLen": 1024,
							"required": true,
							"illegalChars": "",
							"type":"domainCheck"
						},
						"tips":"请填写子链1目标地址，http(s)开头",
						"inputType": "text",
						"varType": "url",
						"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
					},
					{
						"key": "2_subpath_text",
						"alias": "子链2",
						"validation": {
							"minLen": 1,
							"maxLen": 16,
							"required": true,
							"illegalChars": ""
						},
						"tips":"长度1到16个字符",
						"inputType": "text",
						"varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
					},
					{
						"key": "2_subpath_url",
						"alias": "目标网址2",
						"validation": {
							"minLen": 1,
							"maxLen": 1024,
							"required": true,
							"illegalChars": "",
							"type":"domainCheck"
						},
						"tips":"请填写子链2目标地址，http(s)开头",
						"inputType": "text",
						"varType": "url",
						"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
					}
					
			]
		}
		
		
	]
}

>","varType":"h1"},{"alias":"目标网址2","inputType":"text","key":"2_subpath_url","secondaryVarType":"target","showKey":false,"tips":"请填写子链2目标地址，http(s)开头","validation":{"duration":0,"illegalChars":"","maxLen":1024,"minLen":1,"required":true,"resolution":{"ratio":"","whiteList":[]},"type":"domainCheck"},"value":"http://e.sm.cn","varType":"url"}],"referVarType":"main"}]
